TopicTitle: No Stock Clamp O Tron Docking Ports

Articles.Content:
Hello,

Playing ver 1.12.2.3167 and got to mission where I need to dock and transfer crew in orbit.
Constructing vessel but no docking ports are available even though I am well advanced thru research......any ideas??
I thought they were stock??

Thanks

They indeed are. Level 5 / Miniaturization gives you 0.625 version, Level 6 / Specialized Construction has 1.25 m port. For 2.5m docking port advance to level 8 / Meta Materials

Well advanced through research means what? What level you are researching?

Thanks for prompt response.
I have both level 5 Miniaturization and 6 Specialized.

The only docking port I have access to is an inflatable one??

Thanks again

Lost parts in editor once happened to me, but it was my mistake running two instances of game and killing one of them during loading screen. Game restart worked. But if you suffer this problem after game/PC restart, check (or refresh using your install source) GameData/Squad folder. Also take a look into log file, if it says something about spoken parts loading problems.
Good to know, thanks for reply
Thread moved to the support sub and I'm glad your issue was resolved.
